name: Spiced Toasted Seeds
keywords: appetizer, curry powder, pumpkin seeds, squash seeds, fall, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: 1 1/2 cups unshelled squash or pumpkin seeds, washed and dried

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spread seeds on a cookie sheet liberally covered with olive oil. Bake 15 to 20 minutes, or until seeds turn a light golden brown.
Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl. Remove seeds from oven, and toss them in the spices. Toasted seeds will keep several weeks at room temperature.
